allow: Bash(bash -c 'npx vite &>/tmp/vite.log & VIT_PID=$!; sleep 5; curl -s http://localhost:5173 | head -20; kill $VIT_PID 2>/dev/null; wait $VIT_PID 2>/dev/null')
Bash(bash -c 'npx vite --port 5174 &>/tmp/vite2.log & VIT_PID=$!; sleep 5; curl -s http://localhost:5174 | head -20; kill $VIT_PID 2>/dev/null; wait $VIT_PID 2>/dev/null')
Bash(bash -c 'npx vite --port 5175 &>/tmp/vite3.log & VIT_PID=$!; sleep 5; RESP=$\(curl -s http://localhost:5175\); echo ""$RESP"" | head -20; kill $VIT_PID 2>/dev/null; wait $VIT_PID 2>/dev/null')
